XXacatstvu:3: sa sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanṃaṇḍalānugataḥ kāyo dharmasvabhāvagatiṃgatatvān manomaya ity ucyate /
XXacatstvu:4: yadā cittaṃ manaś cāpi vijñānaṃ na pravartate /
XXacatstvu:5: tadā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ labhate buddhabhūmiṃ ca //
XXacatstvu:8: tathā sa sarvaśaś cittamanovijñānavikalpasaṃjñāpagato 'navagṛhīta ākāśasamo 'bhyavakāśaprakṛtito 'vatīrṇaś cānutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpta ity ucyate /
XXacatstvu:9_0: tatra bhavanto jinaputrāḥ evaṃ kṣāntisamanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ sahapratilambhād acalāyā
XXacatstvu:9_1: bodhisattvabhūmer gaṃbhīraṃ bodhisattvavihāram anuprāpto bhavati durājñānam asaṃbhinnaṃ
XXacatstvu:10_0: sa evaṃ kṣāntipratilabdho bodhisattvo yatra yatropasaṃkrāmati kṣatriyabrāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdradevabrahmapariṣadaṃ
XXacatstvu:12_0: sa hy anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt sarvadharmānutpādākāreṇa sarvathā sarvaṃ pratividdhavāstu
XXacatstvu:12_1: .. mād asya aparajñānakṛtaṃ kleśakṛtaṃ ca parṣacchāradyaṃ nāstīti vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
XXacatstvu:22: ity evaṃ daśavaśitāprāpto yas tvaṃ dṛṣṭivipannasya lokasyāsya hitodyata ity anena ca praśastapratipattir ameyatvam acittatā coktā /
XXacatstvu:23: vakṣyamāneṣv api sarveṣu pratyekam arthatrayaṃ yojyam /
XXacatstvu:27_0: tatra dharmāś caturvidhā vipaśyanādharmāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanādayaḥ bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ
XXacatstvu:27_1: smṛtyupasthānādayaḥ buddhadharmā daśabalavaiśāradyādayaḥ adhigamadharmāḥ śrotaāpattimārgaphalādayo yathākramam /
XXacatstvu:29: tatra bauddhaṃ cakṣur dhyānābhisaṃskāranirvṛttam abhijñāsaṃgṛhītam aṣṭāvidhaparikarmalabhyatvāt kumārabhuvaḥ /
XXacatstvu:31: iti / tenāpi cakṣuṣā tvayā na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ saṃbhāvyate prāg evetaraiḥ /
XXacatstvu:32: pañcānām api cakṣuṣām anavabhāsagamanatvāt tattvārthasya dṛṣṭijñānam /
XXacatstvu:34: nanu pratilabdhaprathamādibhuvo 'pi āryā na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhante tat ko 'syātiśaya ity āha /
XXacatstvu:37: pūrvakās tu sapta vihārā vyāmiśrā ayam ekāntaśuddhaḥ /
XXacatstvu:39: yadā punaḥ sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmer aṣṭamīṃ bhūmim avakrānto bhavati tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānam abhirūhya ityādi /
XXacatstvu:40: tasmād eva gambhīrāṇāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāṃ nānyo 'smād adhiko gaṃbhīro ity atrānuttarety ucyate //
XXacatstvu:41: pravicayo lakṣaṇataḥ kṛtyato hetutaḥ phalataḥ saṃkhyāta āsvādata ādīnavato niḥsaraṇataś ca kleśato vyavadānataḥ parijñātaḥ prahāṇataḥ sākṣātkaraṇato bhāvanātaś ca /
XXacatstvu:49: tathā coktaṃ yāvat tathāgatavaineyikānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatakāyavarṇarūpam ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:50: iti hi bho jinaputra yāvanto 'nabhilāpyeṣu buddhakṣetraprasareṣu sattvānām upapattyāyatanādhimuktiprasarās teṣu teṣu tathāgataḥ svakāyavibhaktim ādarśayati /
XXacatstvu:52: tac cāsya kāyasaṃdarśanam akṣūṇam avandhyaṃ ca sarvasattvaparipākavinayāyetyādi /
XXacatstvu:54: tathā hi saptamyāṃ bhūmau buddhakāyavyūhaṃ jānāti na tu tadā niṣpādayituṃ śaknoti /
XXacatstvu:55: buddhakāyavyūhajñānāt tu tasyāṃ bhūmau niṣpādanecchāṃ jānāti /
XXacatstvu:58: etasyā eva kṣānteḥ sahapratilambhād yāny asya sugatidurgativipākyāni karmāvaraṇāni tāny asya samucchinnāni bhavanti /
XXacatstvu:59: anyatra [Css_242] tathāgatānām anāgatajanatānukampadarśanād ata etadvibhāge ślokaḥ /
XXacatstvu:63: tatrotpādavigamān nityo nirodhavigamād dhruvaḥ śivo dvayābhāvāt /
XXacatstvu:69: sarveṣv apy avasthitārthatrayopasaṃhāradvāreṇā bhagavato guṇānāṃ kīrtanena prasūtapuṇyasyāsyāṃ bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya pariṇāmanārthenaika uktaḥ /
XXacatstvu:70: tatra praśastagamanād punarāvṛttyā ca sugataḥ atarkyatvād alāpyatvād āryajñānād acintyatety acintyaḥ aprameyaṃ aprameyāśrayaparāvṛttyā vibhutvalābhāt /
XXacatstvu:71: tathā hy asyāṃ bhūmau nirantamahābodhisamudāgamaprayogasamādhiṣu vyavasthito bodhisattvo
XXacatstvu:77: svābhāvikī syād yadi vastusiddhir udīrṇadīpetaraśāntisiddhivat tadā sarvakleśamaheśvarasya carato mohasya śāntiḥ katham /
XXacatstvu:79: pratītyajānāṃ bhāvānāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ jagādaya ityādy āha /
XXacatstvu:81_0: [Css_243] iha bodhisattvas tenāpi vihāreṇa gaṃbhīreṇāsaṃtuṣṭa uttarijñānaviseṣatām
XXacatstvu:81_1: anugacchan yaiś ca dharmajñānābhisaṃskāraiḥ pareṣāṃ dharmaḥ sarvākāro bodhisattvena
XXacatstvu:81_2: deśayitavyo yac ca dharmākhyānakṛtyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXacatstvu:83_0: gahanopavicāreṣu ye ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante yena ca saṃkliśyante viśuddhyante
XXacatstvu:83_1: yac ca saṃkleṣavyavadānaṃ yā ca tasyānaikāntikatā yā ca tasyaikāntikānaikāntikatā
XXacatstvu:84: evaṃ ca deśanākuśalasya deśanākṛtyakuśalasya ca yat sarvākāramahādharmabhāṇakatvam ityādi yathāsūtram eva vistarato veditavyam /
XXacatstvu:85: asamajñānam iti daśamyāṃ tathāgatakṛtyenāvasthitatvād yathoktam āryadaśabhūmake /
XXacatstvu:86: yāvad daśānāṃ samādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇāṃ paryante sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavān nāma bodhisattvasamādhir āmukhībhavatītyādi /
XXacatstvu:89: na punaḥ kurute yatnaṃ paripākāya dehinām // 1
XXacatstvu:90: yo yathā yena vaineyo manyate 'sau tathaiva ca /
XXacatstvu:96: athā cāṇoḥ pṛthivyāś ca goṣpadasyodādheś ca yat /
XXacatstvu:97: antaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhasya ca tad antaram // 5
XXacatstvu:100: acintyam iti yathoktaṃ sa khalu bho jinaputra bodhisattva evam imāṃ bhūmim anugato 'cintyaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratilabhate 'nāvaraṇaṃ cetyādi /
XXacatstvu:102: piṇḍiteṣu rajāṃsi yāvanti guṇā daśamyāṃ bhavanti tāvanta ihāsya tāvad ity anidarśanam uktaṃ bhagavatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmivyavasthitabodhisattvaguṇanirdeśe /
XXacatstvu:104: tad yathā śūnyatālakṣaṇam animittalakṣaṇam apraṇihitalakṣaṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ paratantralakṣaṇaṃ ca /
XXacatstvu:105: tatra ṣadbhiḥ ṣadbhis tribhir deśanākṛtyārthabhedena yathākramaṃ trīṇi lakṣaṇāny uktāni /
XXacatstvu:106: ekenaiṣām eva trayāṇām upasaṃhāraḥ ṣadbhiḥ saptabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhiś ca śeṣāniboddhavyāni /
XXacatstvu:107_0: iti māyādidṛṣṭāntair ityādi saptabhiḥ ślokair yathākramaṃ guṇakathanamukhena sarveṣām
XXacatstvu:107_1: upasaṃhāraḥ kām apy acintyāṃ paramagambhirāvasthāṃ prāptatvād asya vihārasyeti bhavaddṛśā
XXacatstvu:108: asyām eva bhuvi sattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanāya puṇyapariṇāmanam ity anyaḥ // //
XXacatstvu:112: phalāvasthām ārabhya sarva evānāśravā dharmāḥ sarvaprakārām anuttarāṃ viśuddhim upagatavantaḥ saṃbuddhākhyāṃ pratilabhante /
XXacatstvu:113: teṣāṃ hetvavasthāyām eva tāvad aśūnyatā prāg eva phalāvasthāyām ity āha //
XXacatstvu:115: anutpannam anālayam iti anutpannasvabhāvenetyāder yāvad gambhīrāya namo 'stu ta ity etadantasya sūcanam //
XXacatstvu:120: abhimukhyāḥ prabhṛti viśeṣataḥ pratilabdhānām anutpādādīnāṃ niratiśayārthena pañca tasyāḥ prabhṛti nirodhalābhād āvaraṇadvayavāsanāśeṣasyāpy abhāvāt paramagāmbhīryārthenaikaḥ /
XXacatstvu:121: evaṃ stute stuto bhūyāḥ saṃvṛtyeti śeṣaḥ athavā kiṃ bata stutaḥ paramārthena /
XXacatstvu:124: idānīṃ saṃvṛtyāpi stuter asaṃbhavaṃ pratipādayann āha /
XXacatstvu:129: grāhakagrāhyanirmukto bhagavān sa ca grāhake grāhye ca caratīti /
XXacatstvu:131: acintyapratītyasamutpādadharmatayā saty advaye 'pi prakṛter abhāvād iti //
XXacatstvu:132: svabhāvapariśuddhyadhimuktyāpi vastuno [Css_246] 'nupalambliena pravṛttas tu mahāphala iti /
XXacatstvu:135: etāvantam evārtham adhikṛtyābhisamayakramaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣu vistareṇokto boddhavyaḥ //
